channel.title: NE News,Meghalaya News on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in NE News,Meghalaya News on TechnoStreet

item.title: Accessible awareness bike ride by physically challenged persons in Meghalaya
item.description: Accessible awareness bike ride by physically challenged persons in Meghalaya The resolve is to promote accessibility for people like them creating a barrier-free environment and providing the disabled with friendly access to public facilities and places.

item.title: Late Dhyanada Charan Sharma's contribution the society recognized in Shillong
item.description: Late Dhyanada Charan Sharma’s contribution the society recognized in Shillong Sanbor Shullai, Minister Animal Husbandry and Veterinary initiated to recognize the services of different personalities of Shillong for their contribution to the society.

item.title: Meghalaya Government inks deal with NEEPCO to commission hydro power plants
item.description: Meghalaya Government inks deal with NEEPCO to commission hydro power plants The Meghalaya Government signed an agreement with the State-owned NEEPCO for commissioning of three hydro electric projects with a total generation capacity of 235 MW.

item.title: Cyclone Sitrang weakens into depression over north-eastern states
item.description: Cyclone Sitrang weakens into depression over north-eastern states The remnant of the cyclonic storm Sitrang which created a deep depression over Bangladesh has further weakened into a depression over northeast Bangladesh
